ParameterGroupName.description: The name of the cluster parameter group to be reset.

Parameters.description: An array of names of parameters to be reset. If ResetAllParameters option is not used, then at least one parameter name must be supplied.  Constraints: A maximum of 20 parameters can be reset in a single request.

ResetAllParameters.description: If true, all parameters in the specified parameter group will be reset to their default values.  Default: true
